title: Conv
body:
Models with Conv2D layers breaks Talos when using dictionary defined activation function "activation= prms['activation']" with error:

    model.add(Conv2D(p['first_neuron'], kernel_size=3, padding = "same", input_shape = input_shape, activation= prms['activation'])))

  ..\keras\legacy\interfaces.py", line 91, in wrapper return func(*args, **kwargs)
 ..\keras\layers\convolutional.py", line 490, in __init__ **kwargs)
  ..\keras\layers\convolutional.py", line 115, in __init__self.activation = activations.get(activation)
  ..keras\activations.py", line 203, in get   return deserialize(identifier)
..\keras\activations.py", line 184, in deserialize printable_module_name='activation function')
..\keras\utils\generic_utils.py", line 165, in deserialize_keras_object    ':' + function_name)

ValueError: Unknown activation function:[<function relu at 0x000002D8012F0840>, <function tanh at 0x000002D8012F08C8>, <function sigmoid at 0x000002D8012F0950>, <function linear at 0x000002D8012F0AE8>, <function elu at 0x000002D8012F0620>]

My params dicitonary:
prms = {
        'first_neuron':[4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128],
        'activation': [relu, tanh, sigmoid, linear, elu],
        'last_activation': [softmax, sigmoid],
        'momentum': [0.0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8, 0.9],
        'lr': (2, 10, 30),
        'hidden_layers':[2,3,4,5,6],
        'batch_size': [2, 3, 4],
        'epochs': [300],
        'dropout': (0, 0.10, 0.40, 10),
        'weight_regulizer':[None],
        'emb_output_dims': [None],
        'optimizer': [adam, nadam],
        'losses': [categorical_crossentropy, logcosh],
        'feature_maps': [64, 128, 256, 512, 1024]
        }
